name: Alkmaarse Eigenste

config_properties.name: Alkmaarse Eigenste
config_properties.description: A single-day discovery festival in Alkmaar showcasing local and emerging artists.

ai_profile:
**Festival Profile: Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026**  

Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026 promises an eclectic celebration of Dutch talent, with all 25 featured artists hailing from the Netherlands. Spanning a diverse range of genres, the festival highlights a strong presence of alternative sounds, including alternative rock, indie, and dream pop, alongside niche genres such as alt-pop-noir, swampy roots influences, and loop station performances. With a perfect average rating of 10.0 (albeit largely unrated), the lineup guarantees a high-quality experience for music enthusiasts.  

The festival emphasizes inclusivity and diversity, showcasing a mix of solo performers and bands. Female artists account for 7 of the acts, with male artists slightly ahead at 9, and 4 bands rounding out the lineup. While the majority of performers are non-POC (19), there is room for growth in this area, as only one performer identifies as a person of color, with five remaining unspecified.  

Alkmaarse Eigenste stands out for its commitment to showcasing local talent, with every artist proudly representing the Netherlands. From alternative pop and indie folk to progressive rock and reggae, the festival offers a rich blend of sounds, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone. With all artists featured on Spotify, attendees can discover and connect with the music ahead of the event, building anticipation for what promises to be an unforgettable 2026 edition.
